record.title: ERNEST CHILDERS DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS OUTPATIENT CLINIC
record.narrative:
ERNEST CHILDERS DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS OUTPATIENT CLINIC -- (Senate - December 18, 2007)

[Page: S15940]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Veterans' Affairs be discharged from further consideration of H.R. 366, and the Senate proceed to its immediate consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 366) to designate the Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic in Tulsa, Oklahoma, as the "Ernest Childers Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic."
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read a third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the measure be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 366) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
